subject: Steroids
Boxing
lead_paragraph: The unbeaten Mexican middleweight Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. tested positive for the banned diuretic Furosemide and faces a nine-month suspension and a $100,000 fine.
snippet: The unbeaten Mexican middleweight Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. tested positive for the banned diuretic Furosemide and faces a nine-month suspension and a $100,000 fine.
